abstract: Memo From Russia; group of Russian activists, journalists and historians led by Sergei Parkhomenko is engaged in project called Last Address, which seeks to ignite conversations about victims of Soviet repression by installing metal plaques on last known addresses of victims; project requires everyone in a given building to grant consent, leading neighbors to discuss subject that often remains in shadows.
lead_paragraph: Memorializing victims at their last known homes, the Last Address project hopes to start conversations among neighbors to help process a brutal period in Soviet history.

headline.main: Russian Project Honors Stalin’s Victims and Stirs Talk on Brutal Past
headline.print_headline: A Project to Honor Stalin’s Victims Stirs Talk on Brutal Past

snippet: Memorializing victims at their last known homes, the Last Address project hopes to start conversations among neighbors to help process a brutal period in Soviet history.
